pages.text: And/by the time/era/end of day to dusk
That truly the human/mankind (is) in (E) loss
Except those who believed and made/did the correct/righteous deeds, and directed/commanded with the truth/just , and directed/commanded with the patience
Who gathered/accumulated property/possession/wealth and he counted it repeatedly
He thinks/supposes that (E) his property/possession/wealth made him immortal/eternal
No but he will be discarded/thrown away (E) in the intense fire/Hell
And what made you know/informed you what the intense fire/Hell (is)
That it truly is on them stationary/residing
Did you not see/understand how (what) your Lord made/did with the elephant`s owners/company/ friends
Did He not make their plotting/conspiring in misguidance
And He sent on them flying/birds (in) flocks/groups gathered and following each other
It throws them with stones from dry and hardened mud
So He made them like eaten husk/chaff/leaves
